data.title: Cartoon-Characters by their Initials
data.statement:
You're helping an animation studio name its cartoon-characters by combining 3 elements (see those element-choices below).

A cartoon-character is always named in this format: HumanName + {{the}} + Color + Animal
For example: {{Pete the Silver Kangaroo}}, whose initials are {{PSK}}

The studio will provide you with the [[initials]] they want, and the [[minimumLength]] and [[maximumLength]] allowed for the full name (including {{the}} and spaces).

You'll output all the options, alphabetically by full name (each on a separate line).
If there are no options, output {{NONE}}




<<~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Choices for those 3 elements ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ >>

<<HumanNames:>>
Adam Alex Archie Arnold August Bert Calvin Charlie Clifton Cornelius Curtis Dan Dennis Dewey Douglas Earnest Ed Elbert Ellis Felix Franklin Gerald Gilbert Glenn Gordon Horace Hubert Ira Irvin Irving Jake Jerome Jerry Jose Juan Mack Marion Marshall Maurice Max Morris Nathan Nathaniel Nelson Oliver Ollie Orville Otis Otto Percy Perry Pete Roland Roosevelt Roscoe Rudolph Rufus Sidney Stepback Sylvester Ted Vernon Vincent Virgil Wallace Warren Wayne Wesley Wilbur Willard

<<Colors:>>
Amber Aqua Aquamarine Auburn Azure Beige Black Blue Bronze Brown Buff Cerulean Charcoal Chartreuse Chocolate Copper Coral Crimson Cyan Ecru Emerald Fuchsia Gold Goldenrod Gray Green Indigo Ivory Jade Khaki Lavender Lilac Magenta Maroon Mauve Olive Orange Orchid Periwinkle Pewter Pink Puce Purple Red Rose Ruby Sapphire Scarlet Sepia Sienna Silver Tan Taupe Teal Terracotta Topaz Turquoise Ultramarine Umber Vermilion Violet Viridian White Yellow

<<Animals:>>
Alligator Armadillo Baboon Badger Bat Bear Beaver Buffalo Bull Camel Cat Cheetah Chimpanzee Cow Crocodile Crow Dog Dolphin Donkey Duck Elephant Fish Fox Frog Giraffe Goat Goose Gorilla Hamster Hedgehog Hen Hippopotamus Horse Iguana Jaguar Jellyfish Kangaroo Koala Lemur Lion Lizard Llama Mammoth Meerkat Monkey Mouse Orangutan Ostrich Otter Owl Panther Pigeon Rabbit Racoon Rat Rhinoceros Sheep Sloth Snake Swan Tiger Turtle Whale Wolf

data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A string [[initials]] An integer [[minimumLength]] {{to}} An integer [[maximumLength]]

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You're helping an animation studio name its cartoon-characters by combining 3 elements (see those element-choices below).

A cartoon-character is always named in this format: HumanName + the + Color + Animal
For example: Pete the Silver Kangaroo, whose initials are PSK

The studio will provide you with the initials they want, and the minimumLength and maximumLength allowed for the full name (including the and spaces).

You'll output all the options, alphabetically by full name (each on a separate line).
If there are no options, output NONE




~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Choices for those 3 elements ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

HumanNames:
Adam Alex Archie Arnold August Bert Calvin Charlie Clifton Cornelius Curtis Dan Dennis Dewey Douglas Earnest Ed Elbert Ellis Felix Franklin Gerald Gilbert Glenn Gordon Horace Hubert Ira Irvin Irving Jake Jerome Jerry Jose Juan Mack Marion Marshall Maurice Max Morris Nathan Nathaniel Nelson Oliver Ollie Orville Otis Otto Percy Perry Pete Roland Roosevelt Roscoe Rudolph Rufus Sidney Stepback Sylvester Ted Vernon Vincent Virgil Wallace Warren Wayne Wesley Wilbur Willard

Colors:
Amber Aqua Aquamarine Auburn Azure Beige Black Blue Bronze Brown Buff Cerulean Charcoal Chartreuse Chocolate Copper Coral Crimson Cyan Ecru Emerald Fuchsia Gold Goldenrod Gray Green Indigo Ivory Jade Khaki Lavender Lilac Magenta Maroon Mauve Olive Orange Orchid Periwinkle Pewter Pink Puce Purple Red Rose Ruby Sapphire Scarlet Sepia Sienna Silver Tan Taupe Teal Terracotta Topaz Turquoise Ultramarine Umber Vermilion Violet Viridian White Yellow

Animals:
Alligator Armadillo Baboon Badger Bat Bear Beaver Buffalo Bull Camel Cat Cheetah Chimpanzee Cow Crocodile Crow Dog Dolphin Donkey Duck Elephant Fish Fox Frog Giraffe Goat Goose Gorilla Hamster Hedgehog Hen Hippopotamus Horse Iguana Jaguar Jellyfish Kangaroo Koala Lemur Lion Lizard Llama Mammoth Meerkat Monkey Mouse Orangutan Ostrich Otter Owl Panther Pigeon Rabbit Racoon Rat Rhinoceros Sheep Sloth Snake Swan Tiger Turtle Whale Wolf
Input
Line 1: A string initials An integer minimumLength to An integer maximumLength
Output
NONE or alphabetical list of options
Constraints
10 ≤ minimumLength ≤ maximumLength ≤ 40
Example
Input
SYH 13 to 22
Output
Sidney the Yellow Hen
